name: ONE Rule
description:
**ONLY  1.99$ FOR  THE NEXT 14 DAYS!! **

1.99$ USD    3.99$  USD   

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Make your way to the finish line as you roll around the colorful, epic course by pushing and moving big and small objects while trying not to fall in the hot bubbling lava.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------This game was made for all ages-------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS

-Use arrow keys to move

-When playing, click escape to pause

-There is only ONE rule... DON'T FALL IN THE LAVA... and... I guess have fun  ;)

-REMEMBER: The checkered: 

  • yellow platforms kill you 
  • magenta platforms move
  •  light blue objects fall when you run into them
  • orange objects are checkpoints

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please Note: If you find any bugs/glitches please report them to me.

I would like it if you shared this game with your friends and family.

Thank you,
Semite
